system.requirements: Try to bring fourth a Daemonic Beast, exact ritual depends on the God the Beast is from (see Core Summon Requirements).
system.effect:
A Daemonic Beast is summoned, it remains corporeal for 1d5+5 rounds, +1 Round per Degree of Success on Ritual Test. If the veil between reality is thin, or the daemon is further empowered through slaughter it may stay for longer.
A -10 Daemonic Mastery Test may be made to take control of the Daemon. (not the same as making it a mount).
system.costs: The Ritual triggers two Psychic Phenomena.
system.failure: Contempt of the Warp Occurs, with +10 to the roll per Degree of Failiure on Ritual Test.
